Inputs Required: Rule#280-Detect when One or more Sophos services are missing or not running.
Instructions: Description:The rule will detect when one or more sophos services are missing or not running properly
Check the device, name of service (missing or not running) , source IP, source name, time

Inputs Required: Check Sophos Console for the user health agent status
Instructions: Check in the sophos console >> My products >>  Endpoint >> computer (check with a bad status) update the user details if any service is missing.

Inputs Required: Check if the status all the services are running or not
Instructions:
If all services are running ok, no need to take action. 
If any service is missing raise a ticket or Incident to SSIT Team.

Inputs Required: Make a word document to list the details of user if any of the sophos services missing
Instructions: Attached the details as an Artificats to next sheet based on the details available in the events, update accordingly in the word document.

Inputs Required: Raise a Incident ticket in SNOW
Instructions: Steps to create incident (Ref: Incident Screeshot)

Inputs Required: Upload the same word document (Step no. 6) and also upload the "Sophos perm Fix" video which is shared in the soc group
Instructions: Attach word document with all the details and upload the video, For video link refer next sheet (Video Link tab)

Inputs Required: Follow up with the IT Team for raising the ticket
Instructions: Regularly Check for the updates from the SSIT team for status of the ticket.
